              java.lang.String ep,

        Parameters:
        name - name of packer or compiler
        ep - epOnly flag as string, will be converted to boolean true iff the string is "true"
        sig - byte sequence as hex string, uknown bytes are marked as "??"

      • bytes2hex

        public static java.lang.String bytes2hex(scala.Option<java.lang.Object>[] bytes,
                         java.lang.String sep)
        Converts an array of Option bytes to its hex string representation. None is converted to "??"

        Parameters:
        bytes - byte array to be converted
        sep - the character(s) that separates to bytes in the string
        Returns:
        string that represents the byte values as hex numbers

      • hex2bytes

        public static scala.Option<java.lang.Object>[] hex2bytes(java.lang.String hex)
        Converts a hex string representation to an array of option bytes. "??" is converted to None.

        Parameters:
        hex - the hex string with ?? indicating unknown byte values
        Returns:
        an array of option bytes with None indicating unknown values
